title: CLIL-Integrated Education for Enhancing Critical Digital Awareness Through Augmented Reality

context.prior_knowledge: Basic digital literacy and English communication proficiency
context.additional_context: A course where learners from diverse sociocultural backgrounds develop the ability to evaluate the credibility of digital information through AR-based content creation and analysis.

learning_goals: Learners can analyze at least three criteria for evaluating the credibility of digital content using AR tools.
Learners improve critical reading skills of English-based digital resources by 20% through the CLIL (Content and Language Integrated Learning) approach.
Learners can implement and resolve virtual social debate scenarios via AR simulations through team-based projects.

resources: CLIL (Content and Language Integrated Learning) Materials

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
